Khofifah Sebut GBT Bau Sampah, Anak Buah Risma Meradang
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Gubernur Jawa Timur Khofifah Indar Parawansa menyebut Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo bau sampah, Pemkot Surabaya tak terima (CNN Indonesia/Feri Agus Setyawan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Gubernur Jawa Timur Khofifah Indar Parawansa mengaku mencium bau sampah di Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT) Surabaya. Stadion itu diketahui termasuk salah satu opsi lokasi gelaran Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021 mendatang.Khofifah mengaku khawatir jika aroma sampah di stadion berkapasitas 55.000 penonton tersebut mengganggu para petinggi FIFA saat melakukan kunjungan."Saya sudah ke GBT. Kalau sore, kena angin suka aroma sampah. Engko nek [nanti kalau] pas FIFA visit ke sana terus pas anginnya itu masuk, ini aroma apa," kata Khofifah di Gedung Negara Grahadi Surabaya, Jumat (1/11).Khofifah lalu mengusulkan beberapa stadion lain sebagai alternatif lokasi gelaran piala dunia. Salah satunya yakni Stadion Kanjuruhan, Malang.Opsi itu diajukan Khofifah agar Jatim bisa tetap memiliki kans untuk menjadi tuan rumah pertandingan Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021 nanti. Ada 10 usulan lokasi PSSI yang diajukan kepada FIFA."Makanya kita menyampaikan opsi lain, pokoke Jatim, harus ada yang dijadikan venue. Kita ajukan stadion Kanjuruhan, Malang," ujarnya.Pertimbangan Khofifah mengusulkan Kanjuruhan karena menilai stadion itu memiliki fasilitas yang baik untuk menunjang latihan tim. Selain Kanjuruhan, Khofifah juga mengusulkan Stadion Gelora Delta Sidoarjo."Tapi kalau di Kanjuruhan relatif itu ter-support. Ini bukan soal Bonekmania dan Arema lho ya. Saya ingin bahwa untuk (Jatim) dijadikan salah satu venue dari 10 yang diajukan ke FIFA," katanya.Ia juga mengaku sudah memberitahukan opsi ini kepada Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora) Zainudin Amali, serta Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara ( BUMN) Erick Thohir.


Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo Surabaya (ANTARA FOTO/Zabur Karuru)

Pemkot Surabaya MeradangKepala Bidang Sarana dan Prasarana Diaspora Surabaya Edi Santos membantah dengan tegas pernyataan Khofifah yang menyebut Stadion GBT bau sampah. Dia yakin tidak ada bau sampah atau busuk."Selamat sore Bu Khofifah. Saya menangani Gelora Bung Tomo sembilan tahun. Persebaya menggelar pertandingan di Gelora Bung Tomo sudah ratusan kali, tidak pernah bau sampah, tidak pernah bau busuk. Itu ada metodenya ya," kata Edi, melalui video siaran persnya, yang diterima CNNIndonesia.com, Jumat (1/11).Kota Surabaya sendiri dipimpin oleh kader PDIP Tri Rismaharini atau dikenal dengan Risma.Edi juga meminta Khofifah agar tidak mengganggu proses Surabaya yang sedang bersiap diri menjadi salah satu tuan rumah venue Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021 mendatang. Edi mengaku tetap optimis meski Khofifah menganggap Stadion GBT bau sampah."Coba Bu Khofifah lihat aja sepak bola, tidak ada persoalan ya. Jadi jangan mengganggu kaitannya Surabaya menjadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021. Tempat latihan kita buatkan, siapkan. Kita optimis. Terima kasih," katanya.(frd/bmw)

Khofifah Call GBT Odor Trash, Risma Inflamed Citizen
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


East Java Governor Khofifah Indar Parawansa called the Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium the smell of garbage, Surabaya City Government did not accept (CNN Indonesia / Feri Agus Setyawan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - East Java Governor Khofifah Indar Parawansa claimed to smell garbage at the Gelora Bung Tomo Stadium (GBT) in Surabaya. The stadium is known to be one of the options for the U21 World Cup event in 2021. Khofifah said she was worried that the scent of garbage in the stadium with a capacity of 55,000 spectators disturbed FIFA officials during a visit. "I have already been to the GBT. If the afternoon, hit by the wind like "The smell of garbage. Engko nek [later if] after FIFA visit there, when the wind comes in, what is this aroma," Khofifah said in the Grahadi State Building Surabaya, Friday (1/11). Khofifah then proposed several other stadiums as an alternative location for the event World Cup. One of them is Kanjuruhan Stadium, Malang. The option was proposed by Khofifah so that East Java could still have a chance to host the U-20 World Cup match in 2021 later. There are 10 PSSI location proposals submitted to FIFA. "So we submit another option, mainly East Java, there must be a venue. We propose the Kanjempuan stadium, Malang," he said. team training. Besides Kanjempuan, Khofifah also proposed the Gelora Delta Stadium in Sidoarjo. "But if in Kanjuruhan it is relatively supported. This is not a matter of Bonekmania and Arema you know. I want that for (East Java) to be one of the 10 venues submitted to FIFA," he said. He also claimed to have informed this option to the Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora) Zainudin Amali, as well as Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir.


Gelora Bung Tomo Stadium Surabaya (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Zabur Karuru)

Surabaya City Government Inflores Head of Facilities and Infrastructure of Surabaya Diaspora Edi Santos strongly denies Khofifah's statement that the GBT Stadium smells like garbage. He was sure there was no garbage or rotten smell. "Good afternoon, Mrs. Khofifah. I have been handling Bung Tomo for nine years. Persebaya has held matches at Bung Tomo Stadium for hundreds of times, never smelled of garbage, never stinked. There was a method, huh?" Edi said, through his press release video, received by CNNIndonesia.com, Friday (1/11). The city of Surabaya itself was led by PDIP cadre Tri Rismaharini or known as Risma. Edi also asked Khofifah not to disturb the Surabaya process which was preparing to be wrong one host to the U-20 World Cup venue in 2021. Edi claimed to remain optimistic even though Khofifah considers the GBT Stadium to smell like rubbish. "Let Mrs. Khofifah just look at soccer, there is no problem huh. So do not interfere with the connection Surabaya to host the U-20 World Cup in 2021. The training ground we make, prepare. We prepare. optimistic. Thank you, "he said. (frd / bmw)
